Body:
"""Test the tokenizer handles et al. abbreviation correctly."""
text = (
    'In the field of DSCs, Gratzel et al. demonstrated this for the first time in 2004.'
    )
sents = [
    'In the field of DSCs, Gratzel et al. demonstrated this for the first time in 2004.'
    ]
self.assertEqual(sents, self.ps.tokenize(text))
